Santos is requesting a loan in order to purchase beef cattle so he can continue with his work and thereby obtain better profits and give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase beef cattle

loans.name: Welman Armando

texts.es: Welman de 55 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, el posee desde hace varios años un tienda en su lugar de residencia, tiene mucha clientela por la variedad de productos que comercializa, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Welman esta solicitando un credito para la compra de golosinas, granos basicos, refrescos, aceite, cafe, sopas, etc. para poder surtir con mas productos su negocio y asi obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: 55-year-old Welman lives in his own house with his wife. He has owned a shop, located in his home, for several years. He has many customers who come for the variety of products he sells. He manages to settle some of the household expenses with what he obtains from his sales. Welman is requesting a loan for purchasing candy, staple grains, soda, oil, coffee, soup, and other products so he can stock his business and thereby obtain better profits so he can give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy candy, staple grains, soda, oil, coffee, soup, etc.

loans.name: Kariakoo Group

texts.en:
Aziza, who is in her late 50s, is a widow mother. She has got seven children: two are in school while the rest are not schooling. Since 1971, Aziza has been running a small retail shop and now it has grown together with a new business, a mama lishe [cafe]. Her business is open from 9 a.m. to 6 p.m. daily and she is able to make a good monthly profit.

This is Aziza's first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania, which she will use to buy mama lishe chairs and new retail shop products. Aziza is really working hard and now expects her business to improve with loans from Tujijenge Tanzania. She dreams of improving her life such that she can take care of herself without difficulties.

Aziza will share this loan with her loan group, Kariakoo, which consists of seven members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy mama lishe [cafe] chairs and new retail shop products.

loans.name: Jessica Nohemy

texts.es: Jessica, 26 años de edad, es  soltera, vive con su madre en el municipio de San Pedro Sula. Ella trabajo varios años en un restaurante, pero hace más de un años decidió poner su propio negocio de elaboración y venta de tortillas, este negocio lo ha puesto a  la orilla de calle, donde sus clientes llegan a comprar. El  préstamo que solicita es por 4,000 lempiras y lo invertirá en la compra de harina de maíz para la elaboración y venta de tortillas. Tiene como meta hacerle las mejoras al local del negocio con material de concreto.
texts.en: 26-year-old Jessica is single. She lives with her mother in the municipality of San Pedro Sula. She worked in a restaurant for several years, but little more than a year ago she decided to set up her own business of making and selling tortillas. She has set up her business on the side of the street and her customers come to buy from her. The loan she is requesting is for 4,000 HNL and she will invest it in the purchase of cornmeal for making and selling tortillas. Her goal is make improvements to the premises of her business with concrete.

loans.use: to purchase cornmeal for making and selling tortillas

loans.name: María De Las Mercedes

texts.es: María, a sus 49 años de edad, es propietario de un terreno en el que adecuó un parqueadero con servicio de lavadero de vehículos; la idea surgió hace 9 años cuando recibió el terreno y se dio cuenta que en el sector donde está ubicado las casas no poseen parqueaderos, por lo que vio una buena opción para generar ingresos, hizo adecuaciones del espacio para poder prestar un buen servicio a sus clientes, cuenta con el apoyo de dos jóvenes del sector, quienes son los que realizan el lavado de los vehículos; de esta manera genera ingresos suficientes para dar educación universitaria a sus 3 hijos y para apoyar a su esposo con la carga económica del hogar. Actualmente solicita el crédito con el fin de invertirlo en la adecuación del parqueadero (arreglar los techos y el piso) y para comprar una hidrolavadora, así podrá prestar un mejor servicio de parqueadero cubierto y además podrá agilizar el servicio de lavadero; ya que solo posee una máquina; esto le permitirá aumentar sus ventas y los ingresos que esta labor le produce. Su principal sueño es poder apoyar económicamente a sus hijos para que terminen sus carreras universitarias y sean profesionales exitosos; además quiere tener una estabilidad económica para disfrutar una mejor calidad de vida y darse algunos gustos personales.
texts.en:
María, 49, owns a plot of land on which she put a parking lot with a car-washing service.  The idea came to her nine years ago when she got the land and realized that the houses in the area where it's located don't have parking, so it seemed a good option for generating income.  She made modifications to the space to be able to give good customers service.  She has the help of two young men from the area who wash the cars.  This way she earns enough income to give her three children a college education and support her husband with the household responsibilities.

María's requesting this loan to invest in fixing the roof and the floor of her parking lot and buy a hydro vacuum cleaner so she'll have better service with a covered lot.  She'll also be able to speed up the washing service because she only has one machine.  This will allow her to increase her sales and the income this work generates.

Her main dream is to be able to support her children financially so they'll finish college and be successful professionals.  She also wants to have financial stability so she can enjoy a better quality of life and give herself some things she likes.

loans.use: to fix her parking lot and to buy a hydro vacuum cleaner

loans.name: Hope Group

texts.en:
Zainabu, who is in her early 30s, is divorced. She is taking care of her boy who is in school. Zainabu is currently running two businesses: one is a beauty salon, which she has been running since 2008, and the other is a grocery store selling soft drinks, spirits and beers since 2011. She works from 8 a.m. to midnight and is able to make a very good monthly profit.

This is Zainabu's second loan request from Tujijenge Tanzania. With her previous loans, all of which paid back successfully, Zainabu restocked with drinks and beauty salon cosmetics. She has used her profits to buy a home TV and paid school fees and home food expenses. She will use this loan to buy grocery drinks and salon equipment to meet her daily customers' demands. Zainabu dreams of building a house and a business premises.

Zainabu will share this loan with her loan group, "Hope Group", which consists of three members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy drinks and salon equipment to meet her customers' demands.

loans.name: Shehnaz Bibi

texts.en:
Shehnaz Bibi is a 32-year-old housewife. She lives with her husband, three daughters, and a son in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. 

Since 2004, her husband has been running a clothing sales business, and he works very hard to meet his family's needs. He needs additional capital for the growth of his business. His wife Shehnaz Bibi has requested a loan from Kiva partner BRAC Pakistan. 

With the loan money, her husband can buy new varieties of clothes for his clothing business, to satisfy his clients professionally as well as to increase his savings for the better future of his children.

Shehnaz Bibi and her husband are very hopeful that the loan will be a lucky and productive one for their family.

loans.use: To pay for new varieties of clothes.

loans.name: Siem

texts.en:
Siem is 64 years old. She is married and resides with two children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She is a traditional doctor who makes an income of $4 per day. Her husband is a rice farmer. He earns about $3. One of her children is employed in Thailand. 

To improve her family’s finance, Siem request a loan of $1000 to purchase a small harvester for rental. This purchase will help her generate more income to financially support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her farming business and expand her house.

loans.use: to purchase a small harvester for rental

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is a single man. He describes himself to be honest. He operates a retail business where he sells soap, sugar, bread and other items. He has been involved in this business for three years. His business is located in a busy area, and his primary customers are of all types of people. 

He describes his biggest business challenge to be lack of funds. He will use the 20,000 Kenyan shillings loan to add stock of bread, sugar, soap and other items. He hopes that in the future, he will have a financially stable business. This is his first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to add stock of bread, sugar, soap and other items.

loans.name: Kaleche

texts.en:
This is Kaleche. She previously accessed a loan that she used to buy more goats for her business. Her earnings were a big help for her personal, household, and business expenditures.

She is requesting a loan of KES 20,000 to purchase five goats for her business. She appreciates Kiva  for their financial support..

loans.use: to purchase five goats for her business

loans.name: Risa

texts.en:
Risa is 38 years old and married with eight children.

Risa works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items like sugar, rice, shampoo, chips, bread, etc.

Risa has borrowed and paid 11 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 20 years and also earns an income from raising pigs.

Risa aspires to save enough money to be able to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional items like sugar, rice, shampoo, chips, bread, etc.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth works hard to support her family. Elizabeth is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Elizabeth requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Elizabeth has been in this business for five years now.

Elizabeth would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Hugo Nelson

texts.es: Hugo, a sus 39 años de edad, desde el año 2004 se dedica atender su negocio de alquiler de miniteca, luces y amplificación de sonido, actividad que aprendió de manera empírica; trabaja solo todos los días, pero su mayor nivel de ingresos se presenta los fines de semana pues ya posee clientes fijos para atender. Él encuentra en su amplia experiencia una ventaja, pero en algunas ocasiones se le presentan desafíos por la cantidad de competencia que existe en este tipo de negocio. De esta forma genera los recursos suficientes para brindar sustento a su hijo de 2 años de edad y para solventar las necesidades básicas de su hogar. Actualmente solicita el crédito con el fin de comprar un bajo y realizar el mantenimiento de los equipos, así tendrá la posibilidad de prestar un mejor y más completo servicio a sus clientes, mejorando la entrada de recursos económicos que le genera su labor. Hugo anhela hacer crecer su negocio y convertirlo en una gran empresa de sonido, que sea competitiva y rentable para brindar sustento y educación a su pequeño hijo y disfrutar una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Hugo, 39, has had a business renting a mobile sound system, lights, and sound equipment since 2004.  He learned the job by doing it.  He works alone every day, but his highest income comes on the weekend because he has steady customers.  He sees an advantage in his broad experience, but sometimes he's challenged by the amount of competition in this line of work.  This is how he earns enough money to support his two-year-old son and pay for his basic household necessities.

Currently Hugo's requesting the loan to buy a bass and to maintain his equipment.  This way he'll have the possibility of offering better and more complete customer service and improving the amount of money he earns from his job.

Hugo wants to make his business grow and turn it into a great sound business that will be competitive and profitable.  This way he can support and educate his young child and enjoy a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a bass and to maintain his equipment

loans.name: Janneth Stella

texts.es: Janneth, a sus 39 años de edad, es casada y madre de 4 hijos. Hace varios años se dedica a la cría, engorde y comercialización de pollos, idea que surgió como una alternativa para generar ingresos económicos sin tener que descuidar su hogar, trabaja sola todos los días durante arduas jornadas, pues al mismo tiempo que está realizando su labor, también debe cuidar a uno de sus hijos que tiene sufre una dificultad cognitiva y mental, lo que le acarrea grandes desafíos; sin embargo, con esfuerzo, amor y mucha dedicación ha logrado cumplir sus objetivos y generar los recursos suficientes para apoyar a su esposo con la carga económica de toda la familia. Actualmente solicita el apoyo del crédito para realizar adecuaciones al galpón y para comprar pollos para engorde y posterior venta; esto le permitirá optimizar más el espacio que posee y así incrementar la producción que se reflejará en mejores ventas, especialmente en la temporada de fin de año en la que se incrementa el consumo de esta carne. Janneth sueña con poder darle continuidad a su actividad generadora de ingresos para así estar en la capacidad de seguir apoyando a sus hijos ofreciéndoles la oportunidad de realizar estudios universitarios para que tengan un futuro más próspero y exitoso.
texts.en:
Janneth, who is 39 years old, is married with 4 children. For a few years now she has dedicated herself to raising, fattening and selling chickens. This idea came to her as an alternative way to generate income without having to leave her home unattended. She works long hours every day but can also care for her children while she works. She has to look after one of her children who suffers from a cognitive and mental disorder which poses great challenges. Nevertheless, with perseverance, love and great dedication she has managed to achieve her objectives and to earn enough money to support her husband with the family's finances.

She currently requests the support of a loan to make improvements to her chicken shed and to purchase chickens to fatten and then sell. This will permit her to optimize her space and increase production. This will result in higher sales, especially towards the end of the year when consumption of chicken increases.

Janneth dreams of being able to continue earning money with this business . In this way she will be able to continue supporting her children. She would like to offer them the opportunity to complete their university studies so that they have a more prosperous and successful future.

loans.use: to purchase chickens, which she will fatten and sell; and to make modifications to her chicken shed.

loans.name: Lázaro De Jesús

texts.es: Lázaro, es un campesino de 61 años de edad, padre de 10 hijos a los cuales sacó adelante solo, ya que toda la carga económica recayó sobre él luego del lamentable fallecimiento de su esposa. Durante toda su vida productiva se ha dedicado a realizar las labores del campo, aprendidas de sus padres quienes le enseñaron desde que era muy niño. Gracias a ello, hoy en día posee cultivos de papa criolla y además tiene ganado de levante, trabaja solo todos los días desde las primeras horas del día, cuenta con la ventaja de tener amplia experiencia y conocimiento en el manejo de las labores agropecuarias; pero su principal desafío es acarrear los altos costos de los insumos que requiere para el cuidado de sus cultivos y de sus animales, además debe luchar contra los bajos precios de venta de los productos en el mercado; sin embargo, con mucho empeño, empuje y perseverancia, ha logrado salir victorioso de todas estas dificultades. Actualmente solicita el apoyo del crédito con el que desea comprar dos terneras de levante, con las que podrá aumentar su producción y tener la posibilidad de incrementar sus ingresos familiares; con los que podrá continuar sustentando las necesidades de sus hijos y además estará en la capacidad de generar una estabilidad económica favorable que le permita disfrutar una vejez más tranquila y con mejor bienestar.
texts.en:
Lázaro is a 61-year old farmer and father of 10 children, for whom he has been able to provide on his own after his wife sadly passed away. He has always worked in the land and has been taught by his parents since he was a little boy. Thanks to this, he now owns plantations of potatoes and livestock. He works alone everyday and starts very early in the morning. He has the advantage of his vast experience and knowledge of the land, but faces the challenge of the high cost of supplies to maintain the plantations and animals, as well as the low prices of products in the market. However, thanks to his hard work, initiative and perseverance, he has been successful in overcoming this difficulties. 

He is currently requesting a loan to buy two calves, so that he can increase production and the income for his family. This way he expects to continue to support his children's needs and to create a beneficial financial stability that will allow him to enjoy a more peaceful and comfortable old age.

loans.use: to buy two calves.

loans.name: María Elulalia

texts.es: María, a sus 61 años de edad, se dedica hace varios años a vender todo tipo de mercancía como bolsos, ropa, accesorios y productos por catálogo, con el fin de generar los ingresos necesarios para solventar las necesidades básicas de su familia, conformada por su esposo y sus 3 hijos. La actividad la aprendió de manera empírica y trabaja todos los días para aprovechar al máximo la ventaja de que los productos que ofrece son de buena calidad y gustan mucho en el mercado. Actualmente solicita el crédito con el fin de invertir todo el dinero en la compra de mercancía al por mayor (jeans, tennis, camisas, bolsos, cosméticos, accesorios, perfumería, cremas faciales y corporales, entre otros), así tendrá la posibilidad de ofrecer más variedad de artículos para satisfacer los diversos gustos y necesidades de sus clientes, lo que le permitirá mejorar las ventas, especialmente en la temporada de navidad que se aproxima, percibiendo así un margen de utilidades más alto. María manifiesta que su principal anhelo es ampliar su negocio y su clientela, para que sea más rentable y en un futuro le permita abrir su propio almacén, para garantizar una estabilidad económica favorable y así brindar una mejor calidad de vida y bienestar a su familia, conformada por su esposo y 3 hijos.
texts.en:
Maria, 61 years old, has worked for several years selling all types of merchandise, such as bags, clothes, accessories and products from catalogues. She does this in order to earn enough income to provide for the basic necessities of her family, which is made up of her spouse and their three children.

She learned her work through experience, and she works every day to take advantage of the fact that her products are of good quality and very popular at the market. 

She is currently requesting this loan in order to invest all of the money in the purchase of wholesale merchandise (jeans, tennis shoes, t-shirts, bags, cosmetics, accessories, perfume, facial and body creams, and other items). This will allow her to offer a greater selection of items and satisfy the diverse tastes and needs of her customers. This will permit her to increase her sales, especially during the upcoming Christmas season, and to achieve a higher profit margin. 

Maria says that her main desire is to expand her business and her clientele, so that it becomes more profitable. She'd like to open her own store in the future, in order to guarantee her family's economic stability. This will let her offer her family, made up of her spouse and three children, a better quality of life and well-being.

loans.use: to buy merchandise wholesale, such as jeans, tennis shoes, perfumes, creams, and other items.

loans.name: Nyantonyo Group

texts.en:
This group of six farmers is called Nyantonyo. It is a group of Nuru International farmers and is based within Kuria West District. The members of the group came together in order to grow socially and economically through agriculture.

Grace, carrying up her hand, is 55 years old. She is married and was blessed with a son and daughter who are adults now. She is a retired employee of the Coca Cola Company and is now concentrating fully on farming. She has been a member of this group for two years now and is the group’s Chairperson.

Grace is asking for a loan to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer which is one way of implementing better farming methods that she has learnt through her group. She believes this would lead to increased yields. When she gets good yields of sorghum, millet and maize during the harvest of 2014 long rains, she will be able to provide enough food for her family and sell the surplus. The money she gets from the surplus will be spent in investing in a business that would increase income for her family

loans.use: To purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer to grow maize, sorghum and millet

loans.name: Sirori Simba Center Group

texts.en:
This group of two farmers is called Sirori Simba C. It is a Nuru International group of two farmers and is based within Kuria West District. The members of the group came together in order to grow socially and economically through agriculture.

Rioba, carrying up her hand, is married with five children. She has been a member of this group since the year 2008.

Rioba is asking for a loan to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer which is one way of implementing better farming methods that she has learnt through her group. She believes this would lead to increased yields. When she gets a good yield of sorghum, millet, and maize during the harvest of 2014 long rains, she will be able to provide enough food for her family and sell the surplus. The money she gets from the surplus will be spent in investing in a business that would increase income for her family.

loans.use: To purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer to grow maize, sorghum, and millet

loans.name: Sabra

texts.en:
Sabra is the mother of four children. She is living with her spouse and children in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. 

Her husband is a greengrocer by profession and has sold fresh vegetables from a shop in the nearby town for many years. Her husband offers seasonal and fresh vegetables to his customers. He has been feeding his family through income generated from the vegetable shop. 

Nowadays, the needs of his family have suddenly increased and he does not have other sources to cope with these needs, so he decided to expand his current enterprise. He wants to increase the stock on a daily basis so that he could generate maximum income out of the vegetable sales.

Therefore, Sabra requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan, so that her husband can buy extra seasonal vegetables.

loans.use: To buy fresh and seasonal vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Makuti A Group

texts.en:
Veronica, who is in her early 40s, is married with five children who are in school. Since 1992, Veronica has been supporting her family by running a fruit and vegetables business. She works from 9 a.m. to 4 p.m. each working day and is able to make a very good monthly profit.

This is Veronica's 20th loan request from Kiva's partner Tujijenge Tanzania. She used her previous loans to buy more fruits, vegetables and coconuts and to pay business rent and buy other business items. Veronica has paid back all her previous loans successfully. She used her profits to buy a mattress, bed and cupboard; to build a house; and to cover school fees, food and medical expenses. She is really a good borrower. Veronica will use this loan to restock sold-out vegetables and fruits. She dreams of building a business premises to rent.

Veronica will share this loan  with her loan group, "Makuti A", which consists of four members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to restock sold-out vegetables and fruits.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan works hard to support her family. Susan is married and has a food-vending business in the Philippines.

Susan requested a 19,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) loan through NWTF to purchase additional ingredients like cooking oil, flour, milk, eggs, etc.

Susan has been in this business for 15 years now.

In the future, Susan would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional ingredients like cooking oil, flour, milk, eggs, etc.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is 50 years old and married with two children. With one child still in school, Elizabeth works very hard to provide for them.

Elizabeth runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 6,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) loan through NWTF to purchase additional stock to sell in her general store.

Elizabeth has been in this business for one year and sells a variety of items such as cereals, coffee, canned goods, snack foods, cooking oil, bread, etc. 

Elizabeth would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Vivian

texts.en:
Vivian works hard to support her family. Vivian is married and has a business of raising cows in the Philippines.

Vivian requested a 10,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) loan through NWTF to purchase an additional cow to raise.

Vivian has been in this business for 16 years now.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and now requests a new loan to further build her business.

In the future, Vivian would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase an additional cow to raise.

loans.name: Martín Nicolás

texts.es: Martín, a sus 49 años de edad, es casado y padre de dos hijos. Actualmente trabaja como mayordomo en una finca de la región donde vive pero, con el ánimo de complementar sus ingresos se asoció con su yerno en un almacén de ropa donde también trabaja su hija, el establecimiento presta el servicio de 9:00 am a 7:00 pm, de esta manera genera el sustento diario para su familia. Actualmente solicita el apoyo del crédito para comprar mercancía al por mayor (jeans, camisas, blusas, chaquetas, entre otros), con el fin de abastecerse para satisfacer la demanda que se incrementa en la temporada de navidad y fin de año, permitiéndole ofrecer más variedad a sus clientes y así, percibir un mejor margen de utilidades. Martín manifiesta que su principal interés es poder continuar aportando al sustento de su familia y en un futuro cercano desea ampliar el negocio, para que este sea mucho más rentable y le garantice una estabilidad económica para poder disfrutar más delante de una mejor calidad de vida en compañía de sus seres amados.
texts.en:
Martín is 49 years old. He is married and the father of two children. Currently, he works as a foreman at a farm in the area where he lives but, with the intention of supplementing his income, he partnered with his son-in-law in a clothing store where his daughter also works. The establishment is open from 9:00 am to 7:00 pm. In this way, he generates a livelihood for his family.

Now he is requesting the support of the loan in order to purchase wholesale merchandise (jeans, shirts, blouses, jackets, among others) with the aim of stocking up to satisfy the demand that increases with the Christmas and New Year season, enabling him to offer more variety to his customers and therefore get a better profit margin.

Martín states that his main interest is being able to continue providing a livelihood to his family. In the near future, he wishes to expand his business so that it is much more profitable and guarantees him financial stability, in order to enjoy later on a better quality of life with his loved ones.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale merchandise (jeans, shirts, blouses, jackets, among others).

loans.name: Masika

texts.en:
Masika is a hardworking and enterprising woman. She thanks Kiva and Yehu for their financial support. She still prepares breakfast meals which she sells to her customers.

She is requesting a loan of Kshs 45,000. She wants to purchase more stock of wheat flour, charcoal, sugar, and cooking oil. She looks forward to this opportunity with a thankful heart.

loans.use: to purchase more wheat flour, charcoal, sugar, and cooking oil.

loans.name: Soeun

texts.en:
Soeun is 57 years old. She is widowed and resides with two children in Kampong Speu Province, Cambodia. She has been cultivating rice and fattening up animals for more than 10 years, earning approximately $1 per day. Her children are employed. They earn about $15 each day. 

To improve her family’s finances, Soeun is requesting a loan of $1,500 to purchase furniture for resale. By doing so, she would be able to generate more income for the family. In the future, she would like to expand the business and rebuild her house if possible.

loans.use: to purchase furnture for resale.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is 43 years old and married with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.  She has a direct-sales business selling Natasha products in the Philippines and has been in this business for 4 years. She requested a loan of 12,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) through NWTF to buy more stock of Natasha products such as shoes, bags, t-shirts, lotion, and body spray to sell.

Erlinda successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her Natasha business. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stock of Natasha products such as shoes, bags, t-shirts, lotion, and body spray to sell

loans.name: New Gensenga B Group

texts.en:
This group of three farmers is called Gesemba B. It is a group of Nuru International farmers and is based within Kuria West District. The members of the group came together in order to grow socially and economically through agriculture.

Ernest, 23 years old. is married with one child. He is a first-time member of the group and has gotten the opportunity to be educated on better farming methods. He is the one raising his hand in the picture. He is very excited about the 2014 long rains season, and he hopes to implement better farming methods to increase the farm yields. It is for this reason that Ernest is asking for a loan. He intends to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer to be used in his 1-acre farm to grow maize, millet and sorghum. He is optimistic that he will obtain enough food from the yields and sell the surplus to invest in a cloth business to expand the income base for his family.

loans.use: To purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer to grow maize, sorghum and millet

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda works hard to support her family. She is married and has a fish-vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 15 years now. She requested a loan of 5000 Philippine pesos (PHP) through NWTF to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell.

Erlinda would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell

loans.name: Benita

texts.en:
Benita works hard to support her family. She is married and has a restaurant business in the Philippines. She requested a loan of 7000 Philippine pesos (PHP) through NWTF to buy ingredients such as eggs, fish, meat, vegetables, and spices.

Benita has been in her business for 23 years now. She would like to build and expand her business to secure her family's future.

loans.use: to buy ingredients such as eggs, fish, meat, vegetables, and spices

loans.name: Santos Gregoria

texts.es: Doña Santos de 50 años de edad se dedica al cultivo de jocotes desde hace varios años,  adicional a eso también cultiva  maíz y maicillo, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas ayuda en los gastos que tiene en su hogar, vive en casa propia con su hijo y su nieta, Doña santos está solicitando un crédito para la compra de fertilizantes, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. y mejorar el terreno donde siembra que es el que muestra la fotografía, para poder seguir con sus cultivos y obtener mejores ganancias y así darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: For several years 50-year-old Santos has made a living by growing jocotes, as well as corn and sorghum. She sells her produce in the different markets. She helps pay the household expenses with what she obtains from her sales. She lives in her own house with her son and her grand-daughter. Santos is requesting a loan in order to purchase fertilizer, pest control, herbicides, etc. She will also improve the plot of land (shown in photograph) where she sows her crops in order to be able to continue growing her crops and obtain better profits, thereby giving her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to improve her land and purchase fertilisers, pest control, herbicides, etc

loans.name: Diana Patricia

texts.es: Diana, a sus 40 años de edad, es casada y madre de una hija de 22 años. Actualmente se dedica a trabajar como operaria en una fábrica de bolsas plásticas pero, hace aproximadamente 1 año alterna su empleo con su propia microempresa de elaboración de pulpas de fruta, la idea surgió de su hija, quien posee conocimientos de esta labor y cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo, ya que ella debe cumplir con el horario de trabajo en su actual empleo y en los tiempos libres se dedica a su negocio. Su empuje, perseverancia y su actitud positiva le han permitido sobrepasar diversos obstáculos, especialmente la dificultad para comprar los insumos, pues su casa está muy retirada de la plaza de mercado, sin embargo, ha sabido llevar la situación y ha logrado salir adelante. Actualmente solicita el apoyo del crédito con el fin de invertirlo en la compra de un enfriador, una máquina selladora, una licuadora, insumos al por mayor (frutas, azúcar, bolsas plásticas) y pagar para sacar el diseño del logotipo para sus productos, esto le permitirá comenzar a formalizar su negocio para darse a conocer en el mercado, así tendrá la posibilidad de aumentar sus ventas y los ingresos para su familia. Diana sueña con hacer de su negocio una gran empresa generadora de ingresos, que sea rentable y que le permita una total independencia laboral y, en un futuro poder estar en la capacidad de comprarle una casa propia a su hija, quien es el motor principal de su vida.
texts.en: Diana, at 40 years old, is married and mother to a 22 year old daughter. Currently, she is dedicated to working as an operator in a plastic bag factory but, for approximately one year, she rotates her job with her own small business making fruit pulp. The idea came from her daughter who has knowledge of this work and she has the support of her spouse since she must meet the working hours of her current job and spends her free time dedicated to her business. Her drive, perseverance and positive attitude has allowed her to overcome different obstacles, especially the difficulty buying ingredients, the fact that her house is very far from the market square. Nevertheless she has managed to face the situation and get ahead. Currently, she is requesting loan support with the aim to invest it in the purchase of a cooler, a sealing machine, a blender, wholesale ingredients (fruit, sugar, plastic bags) and to pay for logo design for her products. This will allow her to begin to formalize her business to make it known in the market and will have the possibility to increase her sales and income for her family. Diana dreams of turning her business into a large company generating income, that it's profitable and allows her total job independence and in the future to be able to be in the position to buy a house for her daughter who is the main driving force in her life.

loans.use: to buy a cooler, a sealing machine, a blender, ingredients at wholesale (fruit, sugar, plastic bags) and pay for logo design for her products.

loans.name: Sajida Bibi

texts.en:
Sajida Bibi is a 40-year-old woman who is living in Rawalpindi, Pakistan, with her husband, two sons and two daughters. Her husband is a heart patient and she always worries about his health. 

For 16 years her husband has been running a bangle shop, which is the only source of income for their family. All of her sons are very hardworking and help their father in his business a lot. 

With the sharp increase in expenses, Sajida Bibi's husband wants to open another shop in the market. For this Sajida Bibi has requested a loan from Kiva BRAC Pakistan. As they have no other source of income, with the help of this loan her husband will be able to increase his income. With the net profit he will open a new shop for his son.

loans.use: to buy a shop.

loans.name: Nadzua

texts.en:
Nadzua is a married woman with six children, three who attend school and three who are young. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees. 

For the past two years, she has operated a shop kiosk business, selling to her neighbors and passersby. She mentioned seasonality and theft as her major challenges. She dreams of establishing a wholesale shop in the future.

With the KES 50,000 loan, she wants to purchase sweets, biscuits, bread, milk, soft drinks, rice, beans, and cooking  oil. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business

loans.use: to purchase sweets, biscuits, bread, milk, soft drinks, rice, beans, and cooking  oil.

loans.name: Adham

texts.en:
Adham is married and has a child for whom he has always wanted to provide a good quality of life. It’s for this reason that five years ago he began his own driving business. Thanks to the good service, he has managed to gain many customers. Since he’s had his business, his family’s quality of life has been improving. Now his children are able to get a good education and financial challenges are being solved little by little. He is asking for a loan to buy a new car. 

In this way his business will have the opportunity to provide better service, and he will be able to increase his income. This will allow him to offer his children and wife a better quality of life and better financial opportunities for getting ahead.

loans.use: to buy a new car for his taxi service.

loans.name: Halima

texts.en:
Halima is married with seven children, three adults and four in school. They own a house that has electricity but not piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

Halima has operated a clothes-selling business for the past 15 years. She sells to her town dwellers, passersby and neighbors. In her business, she faces the major challenge of inflation. 

With the Kshs 100,000 she wants to purchase bales of clothes for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bales of clothes for resale.

loans.name: Chanthou

texts.en:
Chanthou is 32 years old. She is married and resides with a four year-old child in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been cultivating rice and fattening up animals for more than ten years, earning approximately $4 per day. Her husband, who is joining her in the picture, is a garment worker who makes an income of $5 daily. 

Due to lack of funds, Chanthou is requesting a loan of $1,000 to purchase construction materials to build a new house. This purchase will help her provide better living conditions for her family. In the future, she would like to run an additional business of raising cattle and send her child to a good school.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials to build a new house

loans.name: Iba

texts.fr: Monsieur IBA  est un cultivateur de profession, résidant dans la région ou on cultive beaucoup d’arachide, il a pensé faire de l’stockage de l’arachide et en période de semence les revendre. Agé de 61 ans, IBA est marié et père de 6 enfants. Il a une expérience de plus de 10ans dans cette pratique et commence sa journée à 9h pour la finir à 15h. Il sollicite ce montant pour acheter et stocker de l’arachide. Il gère les charges quotidiennes de sa famille et les frais scolaires.  A l’avenir, il souhaite augmenter son fond de roulement pour pouvoir diversifier son stock et améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Iba is a farmer by profession.  He lives in the region where a lot of peanuts are grown, and he would like to buy peanuts, store them, and then resell them during the sowing season.

Iba is a 61-year-old, married man, with six children.  He has more than ten years' experience in farming, and works from 9am until 3pm each day.  He will use his loan to buy and store peanuts.  Iba is responsible for the day-to-day expenses of his family, and the school charges for his children.

In the future, Iba would like to increase his working capital in order to diversify his stock and improve the living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to buy peanuts for storing and then for resale.

loans.name: Irene

texts.en:
Irene is 25 years old and single.

Irene works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, sugar, coffee, milk, spices, etc.

Irene has borrowed and repaid one loan from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for one year and also earns an income from selling pre-paid mobile load and from farming corn.

Irene aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, sugar, coffee, milk, spices, etc.

loans.name: Shazia's Group

texts.en:
Shazia is a 27-year-old woman, living with her spouse in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. 

She is living in a very populated area and mostly the crowd is Indian. Mostly people like to chew betel leaf, so that her husband decided to open a paan shop to offer kinds of betel leaf to the people. He offers different kinds of betel leaf, such as sweet paan which consists of a mixture of chopped or coarsely ground areca nuts, mint, coconut, fruit preserves, gulkand (rose petal preserves), and various spices, and tobacco paan, which consists of powdered tobacco. 

He is expert at preparing paan because he has been running this shop for many years and a lot of customers like to take betel leaf which is prepared by him. To cope with the increasing demand, he wants keep more stocks of ingredients so that he can maximize his income. 

Therefore, Shazia requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan, so that her husband can buy betel leaf, chopped ground areca nuts, tobacco, etc., to sell.

loans.use: To buy betel leaf, chopped ground areca,  tobacco, gulkand, etc., for a paan shop.

loans.name: Mbaye

texts.fr:
Monsieur Mbaye, malgré son âge, s’active toujours dans l’embouche. Il a une expérience de plus de 30 ans dans l’élevage de bœufs. Depuis des années l’activité se passe de générations en générations. Elle est donc bien connue de ceux qui la pratiquent. Le crédit ne servira qu’à compléter une certaine somme pour l’achat d’un bœuf. Mbaye est marié et possède de grands enfants qui emmènent maintenant, les bêtes paitre dans la nature. Lui, ne s’occupe que de les superviser et de rectifier leurs erreurs.
C’est avec les bénéfices de l’activité, qu’il peut s’occuper de la dépense quotidienne de la famille et améliorer les conditions alimentaires de son foyer.
Etant âgé, Mbaye a comme soucis majeur de voir ses enfants prendre la relève de l’activité.
texts.en:
Despite his age, Mbaye is still involved in fattening up livestock for resale.  He has more than thirty years' experience in raising beef livestock.  For many years, this activity has been passed down from generation to generation.  It is therefore very well understood by those who practise it.

Mbaye will use his loan, together with his own funds, to buy a cow.

Mbaye is married and has older children who now take the cattle to graze in the bush.  He supervises them and corrects them when they make mistakes.

He uses the earnings from his business to provide for the daily expenses of his family and improve the standard of food for his household.  Being an older gentleman, Mbaye is concerned that his children should take over the running of his business.

loans.use: to buy a cow to raise for resale.

loans.name: Mariama Cire

texts.fr:
Ce membre a adhéré au Banc Villageois depuis  son inauguration. Elle est âgée de 26 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 04 enfants.

Son activité est le commerce ,elle tient une boutique où elle vend du riz,de l'oignon,du sucre et de l'huile.Sa boutique se trouve au niveau du village.

Avec le crédit,elle va acheter du riz pour une valeur de 250.000f,du sucre pour une valeur de 150.000f,de l'oignon et de l'huile 100.000f.

Son objectif est d'augmenter son fonds de roulement et son épargne.
texts.en:
Mariama has been a member of the 'Banc Villageois' (field partner) since it's inauguration.  She is 26 years old, married and has four children.  She works in retail, and has a shop where she sells rice, onions, sugar and oil.  Her shop is in the village.

Mariama will use her loan to buy 250,000 francs CFA worth of rice, 150,000 francs CFA worth of sugar and 100,000 francs CFA worth of onions and oil.  In this way, she hopes to increase her working capital and increase her savings.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, onions and oil, for resale.

loans.name: Saada

texts.en:
This is Saada. She previously accessed a loan that she used to buy more chicks and poultry feed. Her earnings were a big help for her personal, household, and business expenditures. Beside the poultry business, she operates a shop kiosk.

She would like to apply for another KES 50,000 loan to purchase sweets, biscuits, bread, milk, soft drinks, rice, beans and cooking oil. Her profit from her business will definitely help her to provide for her daily needs . She looks forward to this financial increase with happiness and thankfulness in her heart.

loans.use: to purchase sweets, biscuits, bread, milk, soft drinks, rice, beans and cooking oil

loans.name: Kibo Group

texts.en:
These five farmers pictured are part of a Nuru International group of farmers called Kibo based within the Kuria West District. The members of the group came together in order to grow socially and economically through agriculture.

The person raising up his hand is Lucas. He is 45 years old, married with six children, five of whom go to school. This is his third year as a member of this group.

Lucas has been learning better farming methods within his group and desires to use hybrid seeds and fertilizer on his farm to grow maize, sorghum and millet during the 2014 long rains season. He is however constrained financially and is hoping to receive a loan from Kiva that will enable him to purchase these farm inputs. Lucas believes that the use of hybrid seeds and fertilizer will increase his yields and he will not only get enough food for his family but will also sell the surplus and invest in a business to obtain money to pay for his children’s school fees and other domestic uses.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer to grow maize, sorghum and millet.

loans.name: Mavjuda

texts.ru: Мавжуда опытная и умелая портниха, проживает в столице, в городе Душанбе. Ей 43 года. Она замужем, мать троих детей. Ее муж строитель. Сама Мавжуда работает в больнице медсестрой. Одновременно последние 18 лет она занимается швейным делом. Мавжуда в будние дни работает в больнице, а в выходные у себя дома шьет платья на заказ. Сейчас она приостановила свое швейное дело, так как ее машинка сломалась. Чтобы продолжить деятельность она просит кредит и хочет купить новую модернизированную швейную машинку. Мавжуда ждет поддержки.
texts.en: Mavjuda is an experienced and capable seamstress who lives in Dushanbe, the capital of Tajikistan.  She is 43, married, and has 3 kids.  Her husband is a builder, while Mavjuda, in addition to being a seamstress, works in a hospital as a nurse.  She's been plying both trades for the past 18 years, working as a nurse on weekdays and spending the weekends sewing dresses to order.  However, her sewing machine broke recently, putting a halt to her dressmaking activities.  To be able to continue making dresses, she's seeking a loan to buy a new, modernized sewing machine, and is counting on your support.

loans.use: buy a new, modern sewing machine

loans.name: Mariama

texts.fr:
La dame Mariama, qui loge dans un village situé à quelques kilomètres de la ville principale, évolue dans la vente de produits alimentaires, où elle a acquis une expérience de plus de 10 ans. Elle travaille de 9heures à 19heures et gère une cantine dans le marché de la localité. Avec des produits qu’on lui demande souvent, elle décide de faire un petit crédit pour acheter de la marchandise et pouvoir satisfaire la demande pour ne pas voir sa clientèle aller ailleurs. Avec l’argent, elle va acheter du lait, du riz, et du sucre.
Mariama est mariée et apporte visiblement sa participation dans la gestion de la dépense quotidienne de son foyer et cela grâce aux bénéfices récoltés. 
Elle désire ouvrir à coté un magasin de prêt à porter pour enfants afin de maximiser son profit.
texts.en:
Mariama is a woman who lives in a village several kilometres from the main town.  She sells food products, and has more than ten years' experience in this business.  She works from 9am until 7pm and runs a little store in the local market.

In order to satisfy the demands of her customers and prevent them from taking their business elsewhere, Mariama has requested this loan in order to buy supplies.  She will buy milk, rice and sugar.

Mariama is married and clearly helps provide for the day-to-day expenses of her household, thanks to the earnings from her business.

In the future, she would like to open another shop next to hers, selling childrens' clothing.  This would further increase her earnings.

loans.use: to buy basic foodstuffs, rice, sugar and milk, for resale.

loans.name: Séssimé

texts.fr: Séssimé est une femme de 27ans. Mariée, elle n'a pas pour le moment d'enfant en charge. en 2010, elle a démarré la vente de la nourriture dans une boutique et sollicite son premier prêt pour acheter des ingrédients. Elle espère renforcer son activité et assurer l'épanouissement de la famille.
texts.en:
Séssimé is a 27-year-old woman.  She is married but doesn't yet have any children to provide for.  

In 2010, she started selling food from a small store.  She has requested this loan in order to buy ingredients for her business.  This will be her first loan with the field partner.

Séssimé hopes to strengthen her business and improve the living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food business.

loans.name: Saye

texts.fr: SAYE est une commerçante de profession qui s’active au niveau du marché de légumes.  Marié et mère de famille elle appuie son mari dans les charges quotidiennes de la maison. Elle a une expérience de plus de 20ans dans son activité. Elle quitte sa maison à 8h pour y revenir à 13h de l’après midi. SAYE sollicite ce prêt d’un montant de 25.000F pour acheter des légumes et ensuite les revendre.  A l’avenir elle voudrait augmenter  avec l’aide de l’institution ses crédits et renforcer son activité. Ainsi elle pourra améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Saye is a market trader who works at the vegetable market.  She has more than twenty years' experience in this business.  

Saye is married and has children.  Together, she and her husband, provide for the daily expenses of their family.  Saye leaves home for work at 8 in the morning, and returns at 1 in the afternoon.

Saye has requested this loan of 25,000 francs CFA, to buy vegetables for resale.

In the future, she would like to continue to work with the field partner, and use further loans to strengthen her business.  In this way, she would improve the living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to buy vegetables and then resell them at the market.

loans.name: Mousse Djiguene

texts.fr: MOUSSE DJIGUENE habite à coté du guichet, elle est mariée et mère de famille. Elle gère un restaurant à coté du marché, elle a une expérience de plus de 20ans dans son activité. Elle a besoin de ce crédit pour renforcer son fond de roulement et diversifier ses repas.  Elle aide son mari dans la gestion des dépenses quotidiennes et les frais de scolarité de ses enfants. Elle vend le déjeuner et le diner à ses clients qui s’activent dans le marché. A l’avenir elle souhaite moderniser son restaurant afin de pouvoir augmenter ses revenus et améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Mousse Djiguene lives near the field partner's office.  She is married and has children.  She runs a restaurant near the market, and has more than twenty years' experience in her business.  She sells lunches and dinners to her customers, who all work in the market.  She will use her loan to increase her working capital and diversify the range of meals she offers.

Mousse Djiguene helps her husband provide for the day-to-day expenses of their family, and the school expenses of their children.

In the future, she would like to update her restaurant in order to increase her earnings, and improve the living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to diversify the range of meals she offers in her restaurant.

loans.name: Tupatane Group

texts.fr: La Cliente Faida est une commerçante d’une expérience de 10 ans, âgée de 41 ans et mère de 10 enfants dont 6 étudient et 4 autres sont encore gosses. La cliente est membre d’une Association d’Affaires « Tupatane ». Elle est vendeuse de friperie. Elle sollicite un prêt auprès de Hekima pour accroitre son activité. Elle va acheter 1 ballon de friperie. Son conjoint est un chauffeur (taximan). Elle démarra ses affaires avec le fonds  reçu de son mari. Dans l’avenir, elle souhaite construire sa maison et scolariser tous  ses enfants. Elle remercie Hekima pour son soutien aux femmes entrepreneurs non bancables en leur accordant de crédit pendant, ce moment de conflit dans la région de l’Est du pays.
texts.en:
Faida is a trader with ten years' experience.  She is 41 years old and mother to ten children.  Six of her children attend school but the other four are still too young to attend.  Faida is a member of the business group, 'Tupatane'.

Faida sells second-hand clothing.  She has requested this loan from the field partner, Hekima, in order to increase the size of her business.  She will use her loan to buy a parcel of second-hand clothing for resale.  Her husband is a taxi driver, and Faida started her business with funds provided by him.

In the future, Faida would like to build a house and pay for the education of her children.  

Faida  would like to thank Hekima for the financial support they are providing to non-bankable, women entrepreneurs, during this time of conflict in the east of the country.

loans.use: to buy a parcel of second-hand clothing for resale.

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Khadim

texts.fr:
Monsieur Khadim, est un jeune commerçant qui s’active dans l’achat et la revente de matières plastiques depuis plus de 3 ans. Il est aussi chauffeur et utilise son temps libre pour conduire un véhicule qu’on lui a confié comme taxi. Khadim est actif de 8h à 13h et de 15h jusqu’à n’importe quelle heure. L’activité consiste à ramasser du plastique un peu partout, à le peser afin de le revendre aux usines qui vont le réutiliser.
Khadim s’occupe de la dépense quotidienne de sa famille et  de leurs besoins au quotidien.
Khadim veut améliorer son activité s’il a les moyens,voire se consacrer plus au transport.
texts.en:
Mr. Khadim is a young merchant who has been buying and reselling plasticware for more than three years. He's also a driver and makes use of his free time to drive a vehicle that's been entrusted to him as a taxi.

Khadim works from 8 a.m. to 1 p.m. and then from 3 p.m. up to whatever time. His business consists in collecting plasticware just about everywhere, and weighting it in order to resell it to factories that will reuse it.

Khadim takes care of the daily expenses and needs of his family. He wants to improve his business if he can, and possibly devote himself more to transportation.

loans.use: to buy plasticware to resell to factories

loans.name: Rose

texts.fr:
Madame Rose, âgée de 31 ans, est divorcée et mère de quatre enfants. Elle habite dans un village situé à quelques kilomètres de la ville principale. Son activité consiste à acheter pour revendre, des tissus teints et des produits cosmétiques. Cette activité, Rose la démarré très jeune au temps où elle étudiait encore : elle acheter quelques produits cosmétiques comme du parfum, qu’elle plaçait à ses copines de classe. Elle a développé peu à peu son petit commerce dont les recettes à cette période, lui permettait de régler ses petits besoins personnelles.
Rose sollicite un crédit de 75000F CFA afin d’acheter des tissus teints et des produits cosmétiques pour revendre. Elle est active le matin et l’après midi. Elle est divorcée et vit avec ses enfants, dont elle a la charge. Avec les bénéfices de son commerce, elle peut améliorer les conditions alimentaires de ses enfants. Son souci majeur est d’aider ses enfants à réussir dans la vie et à développer son activité à un niveau plus élevé.
texts.en:
Mrs. Rose, age 31, is divorced and the mother of four children. She lives in a village located a few kilometers away from the main city. Her business consists in buying and reselling dyed fabrics and cosmetics.

Rose started this business at an early age, when she was still studying. She would buy cosmetics, such as perfume, and resell them to her classmates. Gradually, she developed her retail business, which, at that time, would allow her to provide for herself.

Rose is seeking a loan of XOF 75'000 to buy dyed fabrics and cosmetics to resell. She works in the morning and in the afternoon. She's divorced and lives with her children, whom she has to support.

With the profits of her business, she manages to improve her children's dietary conditions. Her main worry is to help her children succeed in life and bring her business to a higher level.

loans.use: to buy dyed fabrics and cosmetics

loans.name: Jaime

texts.es: Jaime es un campesino de 48 años de edad, que desde que era muy niño ha estado involucrado en las tareas agropecuarias, pues sus padres le enseñaron todo lo relacionado con el cultivo de tierras y el cuidado de animales. Actualmente trabaja como operario en un cultivo de flores y, de manera independiente se dedica a producir leche, ya que posee 7 vacas que producen alrededor de 105 litros diarios, este líquido es vendido a un recolector que pasa día a día y de esta forma genera los recursos suficientes para solventar los gastos de su familia, conformada por su esposa y tres hijos. Actualmente solicita el apoyo del crédito para comprar dos vacas productoras de leche y pagar el saldo de un crédito que tiene vigente, esto con el fin de incrementar la producción y poder vender más producto para mejorar los ingresos que percibe por su labor. Jaime sueña con darle continuidad a su actividad generadora de ingresos para poder brindar a su familia un mejor bienestar y calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Jaime, 48, is a farmer who has been involved in livestock farming since he was a very young child.  His parents taught him all about growing crops and caring for animals.  He currently works cultivating flowers and has established himself independently in the dairy business.  He has seven cows which produce around 105 litres a day.  He sells the milk to a collector who comes every day, and this is how he generates enough resources to cover family expenses.  He has a wife and three children.

He is requesting a new loan to buy dairy cows and pay off his current loan.  This will increase production so he can sell more and improve his income.  Jaime wants to continue his business so he can give his family a comfortable lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy two dairy cows and pay off his current loan.

loans.name: Adela María

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Tosagua cada quince días se reúne el Grupo De  Crédito Amistad, este lugar se lo conoce por ser muy dinámico donde la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y a la cría de animales, por ser una zona con gran vegetación.
En este lugar vive la señora Adela, tiene 57 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene un hijo mayor de edad e independiente. El marido se dedica al comercio. 
Doña Adela junto al esposo se dedican a preparar almuerzos y bocadillos, él se encarga de las entregas y las ventas, en las tardes preparan pasteles, empanadas de plátano con queso, carne o pollo, jugos y batidos de fruta. Tienen  más de 20 años este negocio  que les a permitido salir adelante y darle lo mejor a su hijo.
Ella está repitiendo el crédito ya que con los créditos ellos mejoran su negocio, con las ganancias compraron dos licuadoras con las cuales ahora está vendiendo batidos de fruta con los cuales sus ganancias están mejorando. Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar frutas  y víveres necesarios para preparar los alimentos. Lleva más de 15 años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por la ayuda que le dan con los créditos. Sus sueños tener buena salud ella y su marido.
texts.en:
The Amistad communal bank meets every 15 days in the city of Tosagua. This place is known for being very dynamic, where a majority of the local people work in agriculture or raising cattle. The area has a lot of vegetation. 

This is where Adela, 57, lives. She is in a civil union and has an adult child who lives independently. Her husband is a vendor. 

Adela and her husband work by making lunches and sandwiches. He is in charge of delivery and sales in the area.  In the afternoons they make cupcakes and plantain empanadas with cheese, meat, or chicken, which are very delicious. They have had this business for over 20 years and it allows them to get ahead and provide for their son. 

She is requesting another loan because the previous ones were used to improve the business.  The profits  were used to buy two blenders that allow her to sell fruit smoothies to increase profits.   This loan will be used to buy fruits and supplies for making meals. She has been part of the communal bank for 15 years and she likes the help they provide with the loans. Her dream is for her and her husband to be healthy.

loans.use: To buy fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Johanna Patricia

texts.es: Johanna es una mujer de 28 años de edad, que durante su vida productiva ha adquirido experiencia laboral trabajando como vendedora en un supermercado, y como operaria en diferentes empresas de confección pero, desde hace dos meses se encuentra desempleada, razón por la cual tomó la iniciativa de comenzar su propio negocio, un puesto de venta de empanadas y tamales que estará ubicado en la acera de su casa, esta idea surge de la necesidad de generar ingresos para el sustento familiar, ya que vive con su madre y su abuela quienes dependen económicamente de ella. Actualmente solicita el apoyo del crédito para comprar un fogón a gas, utensilios de cocina, insumos al por mayor (verduras, carne, aceite, salsas, entre otros), así podrá poner en marcha su proyecto productivo con el que espera percibir buenos ingresos para solventar las necesidades familiares. Johanna sueña con tener un negocio estable, que le genere una rentabilidad y estabilidad económica favorable para velar por el bienestar de su madre y su abuela y poder brindarles una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Johanna, 28, has years of experience working as a supermarket salesperson and as an operator for different sewing companies; but for two months she has been out of a job.  So she decided to take the initiative to start her own business, a food stall where she will sell empanadas and tamales.  It will be located near her home, the idea being that she can generate income for her family, since she lives with her mother and grandmother who depend on her economically.

She is requesting a loan to buy a gas burner, kitchen utensils and wholesale goods (vegetables, meat, oil, sauces, etc.) so she can start production.  She hopes to earn a good income for household needs.  

Johanna dreams about having a stable business with a good profit and economic stability so she can take care of her mother and grandmother and give them a better lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy a gas burner, kitchen utensils and wholesale goods (vegetables, meat, oil, sauces, etc.)

loans.name: Lida Maricela

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Tosagua cada quince días se reúne el Grupo De  Crédito Amistad, este lugar se lo conoce por ser muy dinámico donde la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y a la cría de animales, por ser una zona con gran vegetación.
En este lugar vive la señora Lida, tiene 37 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de 16, 13 y 12 años que estudian en colegio. Su esposo es comerciante.
Doña Lida es una mujer muy luchadora que le gusta valerse por sí misma para salir adelante y con sus ganancias contribuir con los gastos que generan la educación de sus hijos, ella elabora dulces de varios sabores y formas, son  11 años que ella prepara estos dulces los mismos que entregan a comerciantes o si no también su esposo vende en su pequeño local que tiene en el mercado.
Este crédito es para comprar víveres para preparar los dulces, esta desde el inicio en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por la ayuda que le brindan los créditos. Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
The Amistad communal bank meets every 15 days in the city of Tosagua. This place is known for being very dynamic, where a majority of the habitants work in agriculture or by raising cattle. The area has a lot of vegetation. 

This is where Lida, 37, lives.  She is married and has three children, ages 16, 13 and 12 who attend school.  Her husband is a merchant.

Lida is a hard worker who likes to earn her own income and contribute to the education costs of her children.  For 11 years she has been making sweets in different flavors and shapes.  She sells to merchants and her husband also sells them at his small stall in the market.

This loan will be used to buy ingredients to make sweets.  Lida has been in the communal bank since its beginnings and she likes the help she receives through the loans.  Her dream is to give her children the best she can.

loans.use: To buy food ingredients.

loans.name: Dennys Elsa

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Tosagua cada quince días se reúne el Grupo De  Crédito Amistad, este lugar se lo conoce por ser muy dinámico donde la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y a la cría de animales, por ser una zona con gran vegetación.
En este lugar vive la señora Dennys, tiene 42 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen cuatro hijos mayores de edad, uno de sus hijos vive con ellos además de un nieto de 6 años que estudia en escuela. Su esposo se dedica a la agricultura.
Doña Dennys con la intención de ganar algo por su cuenta y con esto poder salir adelante y ayudar con los gastos del hogar se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo, ella instala un pequeño puesto en el centro de la ciudad lugar en la cual muchos comerciantes ofrecen sus productos, además también se desplaza hasta Bahía y Calceta lugar en los cuales  ofrece sus productos,  viaja a esta ciudades en los días de ferias ya que es allí donde más personas llegan a estas ciudades. Su mercadería  la va a comprar a Perú, Quito,  Guayaquil o Ambato y esto lo realiza cuando necesita surtir su local. Tiene 9 años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien.
Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como: pantalones, blusas, camisetas y ropa de niños. Está en el Banco Comunal desde hace 12 años  y le gusta porque con uno de los créditos empezó su negocio. Sus sueños tener un gran local.
texts.en:
The Amistad communal bank meets every 15 days in the city of Tosagua. This place is known for being very dynamic, where a majority of the habitants work in agriculture or by raising cattle. The area has a lot of vegetation. 

This is where Dennys, 42, lives.  She is married and has four adult children, one of whom lives with them, along with a six-year-old grandson who attends school.  Her husband works in agriculture.

In an effort to earn her own income and help out with household expenses, Dennys sells all kinds of clothing.  She has a small stall in the center of town where many merchants offer their products.  She also travels to Bahía and Calceta to sell her products.  She goes there on market days since there are more people in those cities.  She buys her merchandise in Perú, Quito, Guayaquil or Ambato when she needs more stock.  She has been in business for nine years and it is doing well.

This loan will be used to buy merchandise such as pants, blouses, t-shirts and children's clothing.  She has been a member of the communal bank for 12 years and likes the fact that she was able to start her business with one of the loans.  Her dream is to have a large shop one day.

loans.use: To buy pants, blouses, t-shirts and children's clothing.

loans.name: Binetou

texts.fr: BINETOU est une femme qui habite dans le village, elle est mariée et mère de famille. Elle gère une gargote  et y vend le petit déjeuner. Ce financement lui permettra de renforcer son activité. Elle aide son mari dans les charges et dépenses quotidiennes  de la famille et les frais de scolarité de ses enfants. Très sollicitée dans son activité, elle souhaite à l’avenir diversifier ses mets et augmenter ses revenus ainsi elle pourra améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille. BINETOU commence sa journée à 8h pour la terminer à 13h.
texts.en: Binetou is a married mother who lives in the village, and she manages a café where she sells breakfasts. This loan will enable her to boost her business. She helps her husband with the family's daily outgoings and their children's schooling costs. Her business is in great demand and in the future she would like to be able to diversify the dishes she offers and increase her income so that she can improve her family's living conditions. Binetou begins her day at eight in the morning and finishes at one in the afternoon.

loans.use: to boost her working capital.

loans.name: Inés Narcisa

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Tosagua cada quince días se reúne el Grupo De  Crédito Amistad, este lugar se lo conoce por ser muy dinámico donde la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y a la cría de animales, por ser una zona con gran vegetación.
En este lugar vive la señora Inés, tiene 53 años de edad, está divorciada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos,  dos mayores de edad y uno de 16 años que  estudian en colegio, dos  de ellos aun vive con ella. 
Doña Inés para salir adelante junto a su familia se dedica al comercio, ella tiene una tienda de víveres en su casa,  allí vende todo tipo de productos, como arroz, azúcar, aceites, detergentes, legumbres, verduras y frutas,  trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 20h00 y a veces hasta más tarde, sus hijos le ayudan en su labor,  en su tienda ella también vende ropa de todo tipo y productos Avon (artículos de belleza, cosméticos perfumería y accesorios para damas). Tiene 10 años que se dedica a esta actividad con la cual afronta la dura tarea de sacar adelante sola a sus hijos.
Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir mas su tienda, va a comprar víveres, ropa de todo tipo y productos de Avon. Está en el Banco Comunal 12 años y le gusta porque con uno de los créditos empezó su negocio que hoy le permite salir adelante. Sus metas son seguir adelante y darles lo mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
Every 15 days in the city of Tosagua, the Amistad (friendship) loan group meets. This place is known for being very dynamic where the majority of its inhabitants work in agriculture and in raising animals, because it's an area with good vegetation.

Inés lives here, she is 53 years old, divorced, and has three children from her relationship. Two of them are adults and one is 16 and studies at school. Two of them still live with her.

To get ahead with her family, Inés works in trade. She has a convenience store in her house, and she sells all kinds of products like rice, sugar, oils, detergents, legumes, fruit and vegetables. She works everyday from 6am to 8pm and sometimes later, and her children help her with the work. She also sells all types of clothing and Avon products (beauty items, cosmetics, perfume, and ladies' accessories) in her shop. She's been working in this business for 10 years, and faces the hard work just to get her children ahead.

She is going to use this loan to supply her shop. She'll buy supplies, all kinds of clothing and Avon products. She has been in the communal bank for 12 years and likes it because she started her business with one of the loans and now it means she can get ahead. Her goals are to get ahead and give the best to her family.

loans.use: to buy supplies, clothing and Avon products.

loans.name: Rahim

texts.ru: Рахим молодой автомеханик. Ему 28 лет. Он живет и работает в городе Душанбе. Рахим женат. У него двое маленьких детей в возрасте 1 и 3 лет. Его жена домохозяйка и занимается домашними делами и воспитанием детей. Таким образом Рахим единственный добытчик семьи. Он вместе с братьями работает в автосервисе и предоставляет услуги по ремонту машин. Рахим занимается этим делом в течение 13 лет. Он очень опытный автомеханик. Сейчас Рахим просит кредит для приобретения домкрата. Рахим по натуре целеустремленный человек. В будущем он планирует расширить свое дело и отдельно открыть свой автосервис.
texts.en: Rahim is a young auto mechanic. He is 28 years old. He lives and works in Dushanbe. Rahim is married and has two small children in the ages of one and three years. His wife is a homemaker and keeps the house and raises the children. So Rahim is an only provider for the family. Together with his brothers he works in the auto service and provides auto repair services. Rahim has been in this business for thirteen years. He is a very experienced mechanic. Right now Rahims is asking for a loan to buy a jack crane. Naturally Rahim is a purposeful man. In the future he plans to expand his business and open his own auto service.

loans.use: to buy a jack crane.

loans.name: Nyandwi's Group

texts.fr: La cliente Nabakatsi est une commerçante et membre de l’association  d’affaires «Mahoro », entrepreneur expérimentée, dynamique, âgée de 45 ans et mère de 3 enfants qui tous étudient. La cliente est une vendeuse d’habits (pagnes). Elle installe ses marchandises au long de la rue dans un quartier animé. Elle commença ses affaires avec l’assistance de son mari après  récoltes agricoles. Plus tard, elle bénéficia le prêt de l’IMF Hekima. Il y a 10  ans qu’elle exerce cette activité. Ce nouveau prêt va la servir d’acheter 15 pièces de pagnes. Ainsi, elle souhaite  étendre son projet de commerce, devenir grossiste, scolariser, vêtir et nourrir ses enfants. Au finish, elle remercie fortement Hekima pour l’autonomisation des femmes entrepreneurs non bancables, surtout ; pendant ce moment critique de guerre à l’Est du pays.
texts.en: The customer, Nabakatsi, is a businesswoman and member of the Mahoro business group. She is an experienced and dynamic entrepreneur, who is 45 years old and mother to three children who are all studying. The customer sells clothing ("pagnes" - pieces of colorful fabric). She lays out her goods along the street in a lively neighborhood. She began her business with the help of her husband after the harvest. Later on, she benefited from a loan from IMF Hekima. She has been carrying out this business for ten years now. This new loan will enable her to buy 15 "pagnes". By doing this, she would like to extend her business project, become a wholesaler, and be able to educate, clothe and feed her children. Finally, she would like to express her gratitude to Hekima for allowing female entrepreneurs, who do not have access to classic banks, autonomous, particularly during this critical period of war in the east of the country.

loans.use: to buy 15 "pagnes".

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Nicole Véronique

texts.fr: Nicole est une femme âgée de 48 ans, vie en concubinage. Elle est mère de 7 enfants, l'ainé est âgé de 31 ans et le dernier de 10 ans. Elle est commerçante dans un marché de la place depuis 13 ans déjà, elle vent des vivres frais (tomate, maïs)selon les saisons  grâce a l'augmentation de sa clientèle elle rencontre des grandes difficultés dans quantité de stock de sa marchandise qui est en baise par rapport à sa clientèle qui ne cesse de grandir de jour en jour. c'est pour pouvoir résoudre ses problèmes qu'elle se tourné vers nous pour solliciter un financement. Le bénéfice tiré de ce crédit l'aidera a satisfaire ses besoins, ceux de sa famille, aussi d'épargner pour accroitre son activité dans le future.
texts.en: Nicole is a 48-year old woman who lives with her partner. She is mother to seven children, the eldest of whom is 31 years old and the youngest ten. She has been a trader in a local market for the past 13 years now and she sells fresh food products (tomatoes, corn) according to the season. Thanks to an increase in her customer base, she is facing significant stock problems: her stock is diminishing, while her customer base is growing day by day. In order to resolve these problems she has turned to us to request a loan. The profit she makes as a result of this loan will help her to satisfy her needs as well as those of her family, and also allow her to save money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy fresh food products.

loans.name: François

texts.fr: François est un homme de 47 ans qui vie en concubinage, il est père de 4 enfants dont l'âge vari entre 17 et 4 ans. Il est commerçant dans un marché de la place et exerce son activité depuis 11 ans et vent des draps, des rideaux et des tissus. Son activité se déroule dans des bonnes conditions mais fait très souvent face à des problèmes de rupture de stock. pour faire face à ce problème, François s'est tourné vers nous pour solliciter un crédit afin de répondre dans les délais et en quantité suffisante à la demande de sa clientèle qui ne cesse de grandir chaque jour. Il économisera son bénéfice pour non seulement agrandir son activité mais aussi subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.
